attributes.action: Maintain all payrises within the public sector to the same scales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rather than politicians fighting for a published 66% pay rise whilst the recent PO struggle to get a net 2% for the year maybe it is time that all public sector workers have the same pay rise.
Fireman have been blighted by this is the past.
Emergency Services like Health Professional should be on equal pay scales.
Politicians are nothing more than middle-managers conveying their bosses wishes to a meeting, and as such should be paid like any other public sector manager.  May be if they don't like the pay they should move on from the job.  If not this is one thing that should have an annual referendum MP's pay rise.  I'm sure it will be a negative amount

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
